welcome_message_body: Welcome to Paderborn, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Paderborn has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: La Pampa

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for Paderborn/lippstadt Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and seasonal destinations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
